text:
Hi everyone,

Is "hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids" => "*;*0" add BU to contact without removing existing business units?

Hi Everyone,
I try to know if it's possible to get a deal for example with the endpoint `crm/v3/objects/deal/{dealId}` and get all the properties of this deal in the response ?
Like :
```
{
    "id": "123456789",
    "properties": {
        ALL PROPERTIES
    },
    "createdAt": "2022-11-22T10:56:41.422Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-07-04T14:54:41.955Z",
    "archived": false
}```
Thanks by advance,
Enjoy!!
Thank you, this worked
How could I replicate the “Recent Communications” bit in the HubSpot company page via API
Has anyone done an API integration with CIN7 and HubSpot?
Hello Leo, how many properties are you trying to get ?
Hello thanks for response, all of them, all properties known, basic one and custom one, so something like 60
I know that in Node, I am able to get all properties via `const properties = [];`
Are you doing your request on postman or in custom code directly in HubSpot ?
with operations hub
It's in a private app so, i tried first in postman, and after in my node app, but I may not try to set an empty array. I'll try
Another way would be to include all your properties in your array (mais bon, pas fou)
not fou at all

```{
    "id": "6002032324",
    "properties": {
        "amount": "xxxxxx",
        "closedate": "2023-10-30T23:00:00Z",
        "createdate": "2022-11-22T10:56:41.422Z",
        "dealname": "xxxxxxx",
        "dealstage": "xxxxxx",
        "hs_lastmodifieddate": "2023-07-04T14:54:41.955Z",
        "hs_object_id": "6002032324",
        "pipeline": "xxxxxxxxxxx"
    },
    "createdAt": "2022-11-22T10:56:41.422Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-07-04T14:54:41.955Z",
    "archived": false
}```
J'ai ça avec l'empty array
Il faut que tu fasses toutes les associations
Comment ça ? Les associations de quoi à quoi
bouges pas je vais te montrer un exemple

Hello, all. Thrilled to be a part of this - the HubSpot community.

I'm trying to get upcoming meeting information using the HubSpot API and it works well, but now I'm having into some problems. Scheduling a any meeting through the HubSpot meeting interface does not work - even if schedule the meeting any time, but it is still available to schdule again( I tried to get a meeting through the API, but it didn't exist)

Hope for your help here. :)

Hey all! I am passing here to ask for tips to make my app more secure. I am building a integration between two plataform and it will populate a HubSpot Webhook to make a CRM card. Does any one has tips or would like/be able to chat a little be more about this with me?

Hi Louis, sorry for the delay I was OOO for a bit there. According to the team, deals are not supported for custom JS events. I am digging in with the team a bit more to see if this is on the roadmap or not. I will keep you posted with what I learn.
Thanks!
